== Features ==
== Features ==
â
For [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]] users, Partimage includes experimental support for [[NTFS]]. Partimage supports most common Linux [[file systems]], and can be found in many [[Linux distribution]]s, including [[Debian GNU/Linux]]<ref>[http://packages.debian.org/unstable/admin/partimage Debian Partimage]</ref> and the [[LiveDistro]]s PING<ref>[http://ping.windowsdream.com/ping/download.html PING Partimage]</ref>, [[Knoppix]]<ref>[http://www.kernel.org/pub/dist/knoppix/packages.txt Knoppix Partimage]</ref> and [[SystemRescueCD]]<ref>[http://www.sysresccd.org/Detailed-packages-list SystemRescueCD Partimage]</ref>.
+
For [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]] users, Partimage includes experimental support for [[NTFS]]. Partimage supports most common Linux [[file systems]], and can be found in many [[Linux distribution]]s, including [[Debian GNU/Linux]]<ref>[http://packages.debian.org/unstable/admin/partimage Debian Partimage]</ref> and the [[Live Distro]]s PING<ref>[http://ping.windowsdream.com/ping/download.html PING Partimage]</ref>, [[Knoppix]]<ref>[http://www.kernel.org/pub/dist/knoppix/packages.txt Knoppix Partimage]</ref> and [[SystemRescueCD]]<ref>[http://www.sysresccd.org/Detailed-packages-list SystemRescueCD Partimage]</ref>.
Other notable features include [[data compression|compression]] of disk image files, support for backup/restore from a network file server and data [[encryption]].
Other notable features include [[data compression|compression]] of disk image files, support for backup/restore from a network file server and data [[encryption]].
